meanings.definition: A boat equipped with runners for traveling over ice.
meanings.sent1: The iceboats glided smoothly over the frozen lake.
meanings.sent2: We watched the iceboats race across the icy surface.
meanings.sent3: The iceboats seemed to dance on the frozen water.
meanings.sent4: The iceboats were like swift silver arrows on the ice.
meanings.sent5: The iceboats left a trail of shimmering ice behind them.

meanings.definition: To travel in or on an iceboat.
meanings.sent1: We decided to iceboat across the frozen river.
meanings.sent2: He loves to iceboat on the icy lake during winter.
meanings.sent3: I will iceboat to the other side of the lake in record time!
meanings.sent4: She iceboats gracefully, like a swan gliding on water.
meanings.sent5: Iceboating is a thrilling way to explore icy landscapes.

meanings.definition: The activity or sport of sailing or racing in iceboats.
meanings.sent1: Iceboating is a popular winter sport in this region.
meanings.sent2: They organized a competition for iceboats on the frozen lake.
meanings.sent3: The iceboat race was filled with laughter and excitement.
meanings.sent4: The iceboat regatta was a dazzling display of skill and speed.
meanings.sent5: Watching the iceboats race is truly exhilarating.
